title: How do you redo the initial Pixelstand setup?
content:
The last Dec update did something to my Pixelstand screen that pops up when you put the phone on the stand. Nothing comes up anymore. I went into connected devices and deleted Pixel Stand in the hope that it would add it back when put the phone on the stand but it didn't.
How do add it back and work like normal?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
